name: Mongoose Search and Information Solutions
overview:
Mongoose Search is a dynamic, leading edge technology consultancy company, specialising in the design and implementation of software solutions focused on Enterprise Search technology.

Founded in 2007, Mongoose Search is recognised as a highly regarded search specialist organisation with the capacity to deliver complex projects with efficiency and responsibility.

Organisations need highly experienced, delivery-focused technical resources to enable the timely success of a Search project which will at all times require a diverse skill set in order to manage and deliver a project of this type. This includes skills for technical management, architecture design, planning and build, interface design, database connectivity, testing and quality assurance, front end development and so on. The right resources can often therefore be hard to come by and complex to manage.

This is where Mongoose Search can really help. With an intimate understanding of the strategies, business processes, principles and best practices required for a successful Search implementation, the company will support their clients throughout the complete process from inception to delivery, and provide a transparent solution that can be handed onto the client for the longer term.

In addition, Mongoose Search has references at the highest levels, including Microsoft FAST, NHS Evidence, FT.com and various NHS Health Trusts.

products.name: Content Refinement for FAST Enterprise Crawler
